about.title: Who I am?
about.description: A web developer specializing in modern application development using React and TypeScript. I love turning ideas into interactive, beautiful applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.

cleanCode.title: Clean Development

fastPerformance.title: Fast Performance

story.title: My Journey
story.paragraph1: My journey in programming began over 3 years ago, developing skills across modern technologies.
story.paragraph2: I believe continuous learning is key to success, always staying updated with tech advancements.
story.paragraph3: My goal is to create innovative solutions that help clients achieve their business objectives.

skills.title: My Technical Skills

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects. Each one represents a unique challenge and solution.

items.title: Yummy Restaurant App
items.description: A food ordering application with menu browsing, cart functionality, and order tracking.

items.title: Mealify Food Delivery
items.description: Complete food delivery platform with restaurant listings and payment integration.

items.title: Farid Leather E-commerce
items.description: E-commerce website for leather products with shopping cart and admin dashboard.

items.title: Medical Checkup System
items.description: Comprehensive medical system for managing patient records and lab results.

items.title: Daniels Portfolio
